    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SpectralClusteringConf(SpatialClusterer<? extends SpatialClusters<DATATYPE>,DATATYPE> internal)
      The underlying EigenChooser is set to an ChangeDetectingEigenChooser which looks for a 100x gap between eigen vectors to select number of clusters.
      SpectralClusteringConf(SpatialClusterer<? extends SpatialClusters<DATATYPE>,DATATYPE> internal, GraphLaplacian laplacian)
      The underlying EigenChooser is set to an ChangeDetectingEigenChooser which looks for a 100x gap between eigen vectors to select number of clusters.

      SpectralClusteringConf(SpectralClusteringConf.ClustererProvider<DATATYPE> internal)
      The underlying EigenChooser is set to an ChangeDetectingEigenChooser which looks for a 100x gap between eigen vectors to select number of clusters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpectralClusteringConf

        public SpectralClusteringConf(SpatialClusterer<? extends SpatialClusters<DATATYPE>,DATATYPE> internal,
                              int eigK)
        Parameters:
        internal - the internal clusterer
        eigK - the value handed to HardCodedEigenChooser

      • SpectralClusteringConf

        public SpectralClusteringConf(SpatialClusterer<? extends SpatialClusters<DATATYPE>,DATATYPE> internal)
        The underlying EigenChooser is set to an ChangeDetectingEigenChooser which looks for a 100x gap between eigen vectors to select number of clusters. It also insists upon a maximum of 0.1 * number of data items (so 10 items per cluster)
        Parameters:
        internal - the internal clusterer

      • SpectralClusteringConf

        public SpectralClusteringConf(SpatialClusterer<? extends SpatialClusters<DATATYPE>,DATATYPE> internal,
                              GraphLaplacian lap,
                              int top)
        Parameters:
        internal - an internal clusterer
        lap - the laplacian
        top - the top eigen vectors

      • SpectralClusteringConf

        public SpectralClusteringConf(SpatialClusterer<? extends SpatialClusters<DATATYPE>,DATATYPE> internal,
                              GraphLaplacian laplacian)
        The underlying EigenChooser is set to an ChangeDetectingEigenChooser which looks for a 100x gap between eigen vectors to select number of clusters. It also insists upon a maximum of 0.1 * number of data items (so 10 items per cluster)
        Parameters:
        internal - the internal clusterer
        laplacian - the graph laplacian

      • SpectralClusteringConf

        public SpectralClusteringConf(SpectralClusteringConf.ClustererProvider<DATATYPE> internal)
        The underlying EigenChooser is set to an ChangeDetectingEigenChooser which looks for a 100x gap between eigen vectors to select number of clusters. It also insists upon a maximum of 0.1 * number of data items (so 10 items per cluster)
        Parameters:
        internal - the internal clusterer
